title: VERBATIM: Latest Syria attack could amount to 'war crimes' -U.N.
text:
VERBATIM: Latest Syria attack could amount to 'war crimes' -U.N. Saturday, February 10, 2018 - 00:54 
A bloody and deadly week of attacks in rebel-held areas in Syria, in some of the worst violence of the seven-year conflict, could amount to 'war crimes,' a United Nations Human Rights Agency spokeswoman told Reuters.   
A bloody and deadly week of attacks in rebel-held areas in Syria, in some of the worst violence of the seven-year conflict, could amount to 'war crimes,' a United Nations Human Rights Agency spokeswoman told Reuters.  //reut.rs/2smHA42
